actions.text: Reported to Senate from the Committee on Agriculture and Forestry, S. Rept. 94-1315.

official_title: A resolution relating to disaster payments made to farmers under the Agriculture and Consumer Protection Act of 1973.

summary.text: Expresses the sense of the Senate that the Department of Agriculture should not indiscriminately reduce disaster payments made under the Agriculture and Consumer Protection Act of 1973 with respect to farmers who use disaster-affected corn and grain sorghum for silage or other nongrain use, and that regulations should be developed which will accord just treatment to all producers suffering crop losses because of natural disaster.

titles.title: A resolution relating to disaster payments made to farmers under the Agriculture and Consumer Protection Act of 1973.
